title: Gnar's Rage {Mana Bar} glitch?
body:
As you may see I am a {{champion:150}} main ╭(๑¯д¯๑)╮ and I don't know if I should be talking about this because I'm not a PBE player.
I've been playing him and when his Rage Bar is at 99 before red, and I start spamming my W {or anything else} while its turning 100 then I turn into Mega Gnar but my rage bar is yellow, I'm not sure if it should stay like that or it should be fixed. 
New  Gnar skin raise your dongersヽ(￣д￣;)ノ 
Thanks for reading
Respectively from
-{{champion:150}} Botz

replies.body: This had nothing to do with Gnar having mana, I meant the rage bar where the mana bar was suppose to be
